Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays and congestion near Jackson due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays and congestion near Jackson due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Belmont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
